<speak>Just to confirm, the full payment option of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_1.payment_amt_1</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_1.payment_due_date_1, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en").</speak>

<speak>Juste pour confirmer, le paiement intégral de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_1.payment_amt_1 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_1.payment_due_date_1, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca").</speak>

<speak>Just to confirm, the first payment of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_amt_1</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_due_date_1, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en"), and the second payment of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_amt_2</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_due_date_2, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en").</speak>

<speak>Juste pour confirmer, le premier paiement de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_amt_1 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_due_date_1, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca"), et le second paiement de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_amt_2 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_2.payment_due_date_2, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca").</speak>

<speak>Just to confirm, the first payment of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_1</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_1, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en"),</speak>

<speak>Juste pour confirmer, le premier paiement de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_1 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_1, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca"),</speak>

<speak>the second payment of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_2</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_2, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en"), the third payment of <prosody rate=”slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_3</prosody> dollars will be due on $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_3, "MMMM d, yyyy", "en").</speak>

<speak>le second paiement de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_2 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_2, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca"), et le troisième paiement de <prosody rate=”x-slow”>$session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_amt_3 $</prosody> sera exigible le $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($session.params.parrs_option_3.payment_due_date_3, "dd MMMM YYYY", "fr-ca").</speak>
